General.Name: Chongqing Road & Bridge Co Ltd
General.Description: Chongqing road & bridge co.,ltd operates as an infrastructure and real estate development and operation company in China. The company engages in the operation of urban roads and bridges. It is also involved in the construction of roads, bridges, and urban infrastructure projects; and real estate development and construction activities. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Chongqing, China.
